Our network.from sentence: Our network is implemented in the Caffe framework .

new layer.from sentence: A new layer is created consisting of the 3D TPS transformation module , the camera projection module and the bilinear sampler module .

2D landmark regression.from sentence: The 2D landmark regression is implemented by attaching additional layers on top of the last convolution layer .

two architectures.name: AlexNet and VGG - 16
two architectures.from sentence: We adopt two architectures , AlexNet and VGG - 16 , as the pre-trained models for our shared feature extraction networks in , i.e. we use the convolution layers from the pre-trained models to initialize ours .

for.from sentence: For the AlexNet architecture , we freeze the first layer while for the VGG - 16 architecture , the first 4 layers are frozen .
